short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Maintain a balanced and healthy lifestyle while searching the web

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Studies show that the average person conducts between 3 and 4 web searches each day. Healthy Search lists 50 daily habits which serves as a reminder for people while they’re browsing the web to maintain a balanced and healthy lifestyle. 

After installing this extension on your desktop, your browsers new tab will be replaced and show Microsoft Bing search results.

By clicking ‘Add to Chrome’, I accept and agree to install the Healthy Search Chrome extension, and understand that my browser new tab will be replaced to that provided by the service with a Microsoft Bing SERP, and the Privacy and Terms of Use of the extension.

You will love the practicality of this simple to use interface, with inspiring background images and functional digital clock feature.

Links:
Terms of Use: https://healthysearch-tab.com/terms-conditions/
Privacy Policy: https://healthysearch-tab.com/privacy-policy/
